resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102962</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102962</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207103</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">St. Louis Virtual City Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">St. Louis Virtuelles Stadt-Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet Virtuel de Ville de St Louis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto Virtual Da Cidade Do St. Louis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto Virtuale Della Città De St. Louis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ST Louis Virtual City Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyecto Virtual De la Ciudad De St. Louis</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores the history of the city and region known as the Gateway to the West. The site includes lessons on comparing life in the 1850s and 1950s, advertising St. Louis, the Dred Scott Trial, Chinatown, the German and Irish experience in St. Louis, the Arch, and exploring a decade. Currently, content for two decades is available: the 1850s and 1950s.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht die Geschichte der Stadt und der Region,
die als die Gateway zum Westen bekannt sind. Die Site schließt 
Lektionen auf dem Vergleichen des Lebens im 1850s und in den 
fünfziger Jahren ein, macht St. Louis, den Dred Scott Versuch, 
Chinatown, die deutsche und irische Erfahrung in St. Louis, der Bogen 
bekannt, und erforscht eine Dekade. Aktuell ist Inhalt für zwei
Dekaden vorhanden: das 1850s und die fünfziger Jahre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore l'histoire de la ville et de la région 
connues sous le nom de Gateway à l'ouest. Le site inclut des 
leçons sur comparer la vie dans le 1850s et les années 50, 
annonçant St Louis, l'épreuve de Dred Scott, Chinatown, 
l'expérience allemande et irlandaise à St Louis, la voûte, et 
explorant une décennie. Actuel, le contenu pendant deux 
décennies est disponible : le 1850s et les années 50.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora o history da cidade e da região sabidas 
como o Gateway ao oeste. O local inclui lições em comparar a 
vida no 1850s e nos 1950s, anunciando St. Louis, a experimentação de
Dred Scott, Chinatown, a experiência alemão e irish em St. Louis, o 
arco, e explorando uma década. Atualmente, o índice por duas 
décadas está disponível: o 1850s e os 1950s.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora la storia della città e della regione 
conosciute come il Gateway all'ovest. Il luogo include le 
lezioni sul confrontare la vita nel 1850s e negli anni 50, facenti 
pubblicità a St. Louis, la prova di Dred Scott, a Chinatown, 
all'esperienza tedesca ed irlandese a St. Louis, l'arco ed esploranti 
una decade. Attualmente, il soddisfare per due decadi è 
disponibile: il 1850s e gli anni 50.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερευνά την ιστορία της πόλης και της περιοχής γνωστών
ως πύλη στη δύση. Η περιοχή περιλαμβάνει τα μαθήματα στη 
σύγκριση της ζωής στο 1850s και τη δεκαετία του '50, που 
διαφημίζουν το ST Louis, η δοκιμή Dred Scott, 
Chinatown, τη γερμανική και ιρλανδική εμπειρία στο ST 
Louis, η αψίδα, και που ερευνούν μια δεκαετία. Αυτήν την 
περίοδο, το περιεχόμενο για δύο δεκαετίες είναι διαθέσιμο: 
το 1850s και η δεκαετία του '50.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora la historia de la ciudad y de la región 
conocidas como el Gateway al oeste. El sitio incluye lecciones 
en comparar vida en el 1850s y los años 50, anunciando St. Louis, el 
ensayo de Dred Scott, Chinatown, la experiencia alemana e irlandesa en
St. Louis, el arco, y explorando una década. Actualmente, el 
contenido por dos décadas está disponible: el 1850s y los 
años 50.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207103</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102962</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/st-louis-virtual-city-project</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
